Public MustInherit Class DataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IDataSource, IListSource

type DataSourceControl = class inherit Control interface IDataSource interface IListSource

summary.span: 作为某些控件的基类，这些控件表示数据绑定控件的的数据源。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that represent data sources to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件，用于绑定到数据以一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. Web 服务器控件绑定到数据的数据绑定控件，并促进绑定称为数据源控件的类称为。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 关系数据库、 文件、 流、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式显示数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 提供的数据源控件使用 ASP.NET，包括， ，和，才能执行大多数 Web 开发任务。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 使用基本类在你想要实现您自己的自定义数据源控件。You use the base class when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 而实现的任何类接口是一个数据源控件，但大多数 ASP.NET 数据源控件扩展抽象类，该类提供的基实现接口。While any class that implements the interface is a data source control, most ASP.NET data source controls extend the abstract class, which provides a base implementation of the interface. 类还提供的实现接口，使你能够以编程方式将分配到的数据源控件`DataSource`的数据绑定控件并返回到该控件的基本列表作为数据的属性。The class also provides an implementation of the interface, which enables you to programmatically assign the data source control to the `DataSource` property of a data-bound control and return data to the control as a basic list. 派生自任何 ASP.NET 控件类可以将绑定到数据源控件。Any ASP.NET control that derives from the class can bind to a data source control. 当绑定到数据源控件，数据绑定自动在运行时执行。When a is bound to a data source control, data binding is performed automatically at run time. 你还可以通过以下方式使用数据源控件与 ASP.NET 控件的公开`DataSource`或`DataSourceID`属性和支持基本的数据绑定，但不是派生自。You can also use data source controls with ASP.NET controls that expose a `DataSource` or `DataSourceID` property and support basic data binding, but are not derived from . 在使用这些数据绑定控件时，你必须明确地调用`DataBind`方法。When using these data-bound controls, you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 你可以将数据源控件的视为的组合对象和数据，调用数据源视图及其关联的列表。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 每个列表的数据都由对象。Each list of data is represented by a object. 由于基础数据存储包含一个或多个数据的列表，程序始终与一个或多个指定对象。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a is always associated with one or more named objects. 接口定义的所有数据源控件都使用与数据源视图进行交互的方法：方法用于枚举当前数据源控件，与关联的数据源视图和方法用于按名称检索特定数据源视图实例。The interface defines the methods that all data source controls use to interact with data source views: the method is used to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control, and the method is used to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 你还可以将数据源控件的视为两个不同接口调用方用于访问数据。You can also think of the data source control as two distinct interfaces that callers use to access data. 类是页开发人员直接与交互开发 Web 窗体页时的接口和类是与数据绑定控件和数据绑定控件作者进行交互的接口。The class is the interface that page developers interact with directly when developing a Web Forms page, and the class is the interface that data-bound controls and data-bound control authors interact with. 因为仅在运行时可用对象，则、 数据源控件保存的任何状态或数据源视图必须公开直接通过数据源控件。Because the object is available only at run time, any state persisted for the data source control or data source view must be exposed directly by the data source control. ASP.NET 数据源控件; 没有 visual 呈现它们被实现控件，因此你可以以声明方式创建它们，并 （可选） 允许他们参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of ASP.NET data source controls; they are implemented as controls so you can create them declaratively, and to optionally allow them to participate in state management. 因此，数据源控件不支持 visual 功能如或。As a result, data source controls do not support visual features such as or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将扩展类类。The following code example demonstrates how a class can extend the class. `CsvDataSource`控件表示.csv 文件中存储的逗号分隔的文件数据。The `CsvDataSource` control represents comma-separated file data stored in a .csv file. `CsvDataSource`类提供其自己的实现， ，和其他方法，因为基类实现不起作用。The `CsvDataSource` class provides its own implementations of the , , and other methods, because the base class implementations are not functional. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CsvDataSource`中 Web 窗体控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CsvDataSource` control in a Web form. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/CS/webform6cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/VB/webform6vb.aspx#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可用于枚举当前通过调用关联的数据源控件的视图的一套方法。You can enumerate through the set of views currently associated with the data source control by calling the method. 数据源控件类可以支持其基础数据的一个或多个视图。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 这些视图由的实例表示类。These views are represented by instances of the class. 数据源视图定义数据源控件的功能，从基础数据存储区，检索数据所需的所有工作并执行操作，例如排序、 插入、 删除和更新。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, does all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现返回`null`。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果扩展类，请替代方法来返回指定对象。If you extend the class, override the method to return the specified object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展的数据源控件类类实现方法，返回的强类型的实例类。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that extends the class implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 由于数据源控件支持只有一个视图，它会忽略名，并返回以默认视图名称命名的视图。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，表示与 控件关联的 对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of objects associated with the control.

returns.span: ，包含与 关联的 对象的名称。

span.span: An that contains the names of the objects associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称的集合是允许的值，可传递给集方法。The collection of names is the allowable set of values that can be passed to the method. 类，该类用于类的实现中，检查方法同时和调用以确定是否的数据源控件是与一个相关联或更多的数据源视图。The class, which is used for the class's implementation, checks the method for both the and calls to determine whether the data source control is associated with one or more data source views. 如果返回`null`，即该方法的默认实现返回`false`和返回`null`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the method, returns `false` and returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现返回`null`。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果扩展类，请替代方法以返回视图名称的集合。If you extend the class, override the method to return a collection of view names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展的类的类可以重写默认实现，它返回`null`，以提供的视图名称的集合。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the default implementation, which returns `null`, to provide a collection of view names. `CsvDataSource`类只支持一个视图; 因此，返回一个具有默认视图名称的元素的集合。The `CsvDataSource` class only supports one view; therefore, a collection of one element with the default view name is returned. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知的数据绑定控件，基础数据源或在内存中缓存的数据已更改，并控件应重新绑定，并执行任何必要的额外工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary additional work. 通常情况下，当数据源控件或参数值的属性发生更改时调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source control or a parameter value has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法时可能会影响任何方式更改数据源或其基础数据绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method when a data source or its underlying data has changed in a way that might affect any bound controls. 在此示例中，一个基于文件的数据源控件扩展类所引发通过调用的事件随时`FileName`属性更改。In this example, a file-based data source control that extends the class raises the event by calling any time the `FileName` property is changed. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 指示数据源控件是否与一个或多个数据列表相关联。

span.span: Indicates whether the data source control is associated with one or more lists of data.

value.span: 如果 与一个或多个 对象相关联，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is associated with one or more objects; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定是否可以作为一个或多个列表的数据源使用的当前对象。This property is used to determine whether the current object can be used as a source of one or more lists of data. 数据源控件将数据作为其列表封装对象; 因此，与一个或多个关联时对象，控件表示列表源对象和属性返回`true`。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the property returns `true`. 此属性调用静态方法来确定是否当前的数据源控件，可以用作数据源。This property calls the static method to determine whether the current data source control can be used as a source of data. 类可确定是否方法返回的视图名称的有效集合。The class determines whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 如果存在，此属性返回`true`。If it does, this property returns `true`. 如果返回`null`，即的默认实现类，该方法返回`false`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the method returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IList System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList() cil managed
Function GetList () As IList Implements IListSource.GetList

summary.span: 获取可用作数据列表的源的数据源控件列表。

span.span: Gets a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中所包含的数据源控件可用作数据列表的源。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于检索一组可用作数据源的对象。This method is used to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources of data. 数据源控件将数据作为其列表封装对象; 因此，与一个或多个关联时对象，控件表示列表源对象，该方法返回的集合一个元素，本身。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns an collection of one element, the itself. 此方法调用静态方法来检索可用作数据源的对象的集合。This method calls the static method to retrieve an collection of objects that can be used as sources of data. 类可确定是否返回有效的视图名称的集合。The class determines whether returns a valid collection of view names. 如果是这样，类返回一个元素的集合控件。If it does, the class returns an collection of one element, the control. 如果返回`null`，即的默认实现类，类还返回`null`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the class also returns `null`.

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，表示与 控件关联的 对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of objects associated with the control.

returns.span: ，包含与 关联的 对象的名称。

span.span: An that contains the names of the objects associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 由此接口方法的类的默认实现返回`null`，指示该只有一个视图支持。The class's default implementation, which is called by this interface method, returns `null`, which indicates that only one view is supported. 如果扩展类，请替代方法以返回视图名称的集合。If you extend the class, override the method to return a collection of view names. 名称可以传递给方法以返回对象。A name can be passed to the method to return a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Visible { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Visible As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Visible : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否以可视化方式显示控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visually displayed.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为控件具有没有可视化呈现，属性始终返回`false`。Because the control has no visual rendering, the property always returns `false`.

exception.span: 尝试设置 属性的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the value of the property.
